Name: Brushwood Buddies
About the game: In Brushwood Buddies, an unusual puzzle game, adorable creatures will enlist your help to craft various items as they journey through forests, grasslands, and villages! Discover tons of recipes, and find clever ways to manage inventory space and resources while keeping your buddies happy. Be prepared for a variety of puzzles throughout the whole campaign! Challenge modes allow experienced players to earn their rank on the Steam leaderboards and compete against players worldwide. You can even create and share puzzles with your own items and recipes!
